rmi.tree

Interface SiteTree

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Site
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteTreeImpl

    public interface SiteTree
extends Site
    Represents a site in a tree network
    Author:
    rakotoarivony, dufaux
